nodes.description: 2013年法国军事干预马里，阻止AQIM控制
nodes.support_text: France intervened to stop that group taking control of neighbouring Mali in 2013.

nodes.description: 2016年1月AQIM策划 Ouagadougou 餐厅酒店袭击致30人死亡
nodes.support_text: Al-Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb said it was behind an attack on a restaurant and hotel in Ouagadougou in January 2016 that killed 30 people.

nodes.description: 2018年3月2日武装分子对 Ouagadougou 法国使馆和军方总部发动双袭击
nodes.support_text: Gunmen have launched twin attacks in the capital of Burkina Faso, Ouagadougou, against the French embassy and army headquarters.

nodes.description: 袭击造成8名安保与8名袭击者死亡，80人受伤
nodes.support_text: Eight security personnel and eight attackers were killed in the fighting while 80 people including civilians, were wounded.

nodes.description: 法国外长 Le Drian 宣布事件系恐怖主义行为
nodes.support_text: French Foreign Minister Jean-Yves le Drian said there was no doubt it was an act of terrorism.

nodes.description: 军方总部遭遇汽车炸弹袭击，会议被迫转移
nodes.support_text: A suicide car bomb attack at the military HQ that may have intended to target a regional anti-terrorism meeting. A room was destroyed by the blast, he said, but the meeting had been moved to another location.

nodes.description: 目击者证实武装分子分两次进攻使馆并纵火
nodes.support_text: One witness, Omar Zombre, told local TV: "We saw four people who were trying to enter the embassy on the east side... So they tried, but they didn't manage it and so they tried to enter from the west side. We saw that they had set a car on fire."

nodes.description: 马克龙要求公民撤离并动用本国驻军应对
nodes.support_text: French President Emmanuel Macron urged French nationals in the country to follow the embassy's advice and stay away from troubled areas. French forces based in the country were also deployed.

nodes.description: 恐怖组织对布基纳法索政府机构发动袭击
nodes.support_text: 袭击针对布基纳法索的政府机构

nodes.description: 恐怖组织对法国发动袭击
nodes.support_text: 袭击针对布基纳法索盟友法国
